title: ConnectWise | SSE UI | Bangalore

Company: ConnectWise
Title/Level: Software Software Engineer
Location: Bengaluru, India
Base Salary: INR 36,00,000
Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Variable Pay: NA
Total comp (Base + PF + Variable): INR 36,00,000
Details: Declined Offer (They are ready to take one more interview and consider me for Principle Engineer then ghosted)
Other Details: 3 technical + 1 Director Round + HR discussion
Interview experience is good, Bad HR experience

HR Ghosted me after giving above offer verbally, and ready to offer 2 lakhs Joining Bonus.
After 2 weeks they called again and check if i am ready to join them as now i am a immediate Joiner, they will ready to offer me joining bonus which i denied

Had a terrible experience, i wasted my time and effort in interviewing with them and ghosted. Now, they again come back and expected me to come in same package. I dont know what kind of HR in the company, really doubt about the culture there after this incident
